english.segment2: Dont you know that every song starts with an intro, Quiet til the middle then picks up and moves on, Dont you know that every song starts with an intro, Quiet til the middle then picks up and moves on.
english.segment3: (chorus). And it goes on and on and on and on, And it goes on and on and on and on, And it goes on and on and on and on, And it goes on, yeah yeah yeah.
english.segment4: Make sure your guitars are loud, Loud enough to move the crowd, And feedback is essential, So that my voice is smooth and clean like, The channel on your amp before you scream, Words like, yeah lets rock-n-roll
english.segment5: (bridge). And it goes one mississippi, Two mississippi, Three mississippi, Four, (x2)
english.segment7: Lets rock-n-roll, Lets rock-n-roll, Lets rock-n-roll, And it goes, Lets jump around, Lets jump around, Lets jump around, And it goes.. (x2)
